machine_start_gcode.default_value:
G21 ;metric values
G90 ;absolute positioning
M82 ;set extruder to absolute mode
M107 ;start with the fan off
G28 ;Home all axes (max endstops) 
G29 ; auto level 
G1 X-50 Y-90 Z30 F2000; place to spit out filament
M117 Setup extruder 1 
T1 ;EXTRUDER 1 
G1 E160 F600 
G92 E0 
G1 E25 F100 ; take up slack AND extrude 5mm of feed stock G92 E0 
G1 E-10 F600 
G92 E0 
G92 P1000 
G1 E8 F1000 
G92 E0 
G2 P500 
G1 E-8 F1000 
G92 E0 
G1 E-170 F5000 
G92 E0 
T0 ; Extruder 0 
M117 Extruder 0.. 
G1 E160 F600 
G92 E0  
G1 E25 F100 ; take up slack  and Extrude 5mm of feed stock
G92 E0 
G1 X0 Y0 Z25 F2000; start in middle 
G1 F9000
; Set speed and put printing message on LCD screen 
M117 Printing...

machine_start_gcode.value:
'G21 ;metric values
G90 ;absolute positioning
M82 ;set extruder to absolute mode
M107 ;start with the fan off
G28 ;Home all axes (max endstops) 
G29 ; auto level 
G1 X-50 Y-90 Z30 F2000; place to spit out filament
M117 Setup extruder 1 
T1 ;EXTRUDER 1
' + extruderValue(1,'machine_extruder_start_code') + '
G1 E10 F100; extrude 10mm
' + extruderValue(1,'machine_extruder_end_code') + '
T0 ; set extruder 0
' + extruderValue(0,'machine_extruder_start_code') + '
G1 X0 Y0 Z25 F2000; start in middle 
G1 F9000 ; Set speed and put printing message on LCD screen 
M117 Printing...'

machine_end_gcode.default_value:
nM117 retract ex 0...
G92 E0 
G1 E-10 F600 
G92 E0 
G92 P5000 
G1 E10 F2000 
G92 E0 
G1 E-10 F2000 
G92 E0 
G1 E-170 F10000 
G92 E0 
M104 S0 ;extruder heater off
M140 S0 ;heated bed heater off 
G91 ;relative positioning 
G28 ;Home all axes (max endstops)
M84 ;steppers off
G90 ;absolute positioning
